name: Nick Solana
text: Well the imperial Manila grievance is an in your face grievance for a lot of people in the visas and in Mindanao. We've not been happy about it either. Ngyn lng naging mainstream ang expression niyan.  the difference between the negative expression is the context and intent. Ano kaya panggagalingan kung bkt gago ang isang subset na taga davao? Kung legit, wala kami masasabi niyan. Sabay pa kami sa pagkastigate malamang for bringing shame and dishonour to our place. IMO.
